name: HellDie
description:
Made for JMTK Game Jam 2022

Our first ever game, HellDie!

It's a short puzzle game about Orpheus's descent into Hades to retrieve his loved one with the help of a die. Roll your way out of loneliness!

Let's see if you can find both endings ;)
Enjoy!

[CONTROLS}:

WASD: Move
X: Reveal which sides would face up once you move
R: Reset (and get a helpful tip!)

[CREDITS]

Made by figadei games -- seven people and a dog!

Art and Animation: SilentPotato (@the_guypotato) & BlaBla (@blablobby)
Music and Sound Design: Decadentia
Programming: Marco & Grim
Narrative Design: Reb (@amic0gay)
Level and Game Design: DMC4EVERUCCI (@dmc4everucci)
Voice Acting: Benny (our dog!)
